text:
Navigating Cancer | SDE, Web Apps | Seattle, Wa | ONSITE

NC builds one of the first patient-centered oncology platforms. We support over a million patients and thousands of cancer care providers nationwide to lower costs, improve patient satisfaction and drive better outcomes.

We're primarily a Rails shop, but there's some Golang sneaking its way in around the edges, and we're always trying to reevaluate what's working for us.

Email me if you're curious; apike@navigatingcancer.com.
